name: Roki Roy
bio: Results-driven technologist specializing in the end-to-end delivery of scalable, high-performance products. I translate complex business requirements into robust technical architectures, leveraging deep expertise in DevOps and performance optimization to ensure seamless growth. Proven track record of maintaining delivery excellence and high-touch client communication while transforming innovative concepts into production-ready solutions.

name: Kalyan Paul
bio: User-centric engineer dedicated to crafting pixel-perfect interfaces. I bridge the gap between design and development by translating client requirements into intuitive UI/UX experiences. My expertise lies in rigorous quality assurance, ensuring every bug is squashed, and leveraging strategic marketing insights to drive user engagement and product success.
